response.overview: "When your only friend begins to show their true colors, when is it time to draw the line?"  This is S.Y.N.C.  A VRChat Short Film captured ENTIRELY in virtual reality.  This is my very first film captured in this medium and I am very happy with the results. This is a film that features martial arts that are performed in real-time to keep it authentic, and fresh. The film started production late June and underwent 4 consecutive days of non-stop filming. This was captured with only a SINGLE body actor, myself.  This film utilized a (now retired) FreezeFrame mod which allowed myself to keep all the fights low-latency and the initial production significantly easier.
response.tagline: When your only friend begins to show their true colors, when is it time to draw the line?
response.title: S.Y.N.C.
